title: Link Building Specialist (Remote)
description:
Want to be part of a rapidly-growing SEO content marketing agency catering to some of the hottest rapidly-growing startups in tech and beyond?

At Embarque, we're looking for a great linkbuilder who has relevant experience in white-hat link insertion tactics (e.g., multi-swaps, niche edits, listicle outreach), requires minimal guidance, is proactive, can handle many different project at once, and can help coordinate the efforts of our linkbuilding outreach specialists.

This is a role with a lot of growth opportunities, and we’re looking for someone who can cope with the pace of a rapidly-growing agency.

**Requirements**

- Relevant past experience (around 1 year or more) in white-hat linkbuilding, primarily in link swaps and insertions.
- Knowledge in the importance of the following things when it comes to linkbuilding: Domain Authority, Traffic Origin, Monthly Search Traffic, Anchor Text.
- Knowledge of various outreach tactics to effectively garner links. Ideally, you’d already have your own email outreach templates to start with.
- Knowledge in various prospecting tactics to increase the chances of getting a successful link.
- Ability to write and communicate fluently in English.
- Proficiency in the use of the following tools: Ahrefs, Buzzstream, & Upgrade to see actual info

**Responsibilities**

- Coordinate the efforts of our outreach specialists.
- Prospect different domains to reach out to.
- Write email templates for outreach.
- Benchmark out outreach efforts.
- Document our various linkbuilding efforts.
- Brainstorm new ideas to make our processes more effective.

**Good to have skills that we find valuable as a superstar link-builder**

- Very proactive


Please answer the following to proceed with our recruitment process:
1. Updated CV
2. Portfolio or at least the best 3 links acquired for the website of your client that you've helped to rank.
3. Asking rate per hour
4. Do you know how to scrape emails and do mass outreach?
5. SEO tools that you are familiar using.
6. When can you start?

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
ARE YOU LOOKING FOR A NEW CHALLENGE?

We have an awesome opportunity for an Virtual Assistant superstar to join our small team.

#### To be considered you must include all details requested in Section E below ####

We have well documented procedures in our online portal. You will be working directly with us and not dealing with an outsourcing company.

A THE ROLE

We are looking at an experienced administration officer, with excellent written and spoken English. You will spend your time adding value in administration functions, document template creation and marketing activities.

Our Client Service Mantra is “ACE” – Accurate, Cost-effective and Efficient

This role is Monday to Thursday 8:00 am to 5:30 pm AEST (GMT +10), a total of 36 hours per week.

THE ROLE IS PERFECT FOR YOU IF:

# You love to focus on being productive, and delivering client work to them in a timely manner
# You have a can-do attitude
# You love supporting clients
# You’re organised and strong time managers
# You love to improve your use of technology
# You have a history of clients complimenting you for your attention to detail
# You’re brilliant in working in the Office365 environment
# Your commitment to client confidentiality is paramount

We have clearly documented procedures. We are looking for people to follow our established systems so all staff are producing a similar, high-quality product that will add value to our clients’ businesses.

B SPECIFICS OF THE ROLE

Responsibilities included in this role are:

B.1 ADMINISTRATION SUPPORT - approximately 40% of the role
# Filing of emails generated by accountants into our document management system
# Sending of invoices and other client correspondence
# Collation of final reports
# Assistance in accurate management of incoming and outgoing client records 
# Accurate data entry as requested
# Assist with email management for teaUpgrade to see actual infombers

B.2 TEMPLATE MANAGEMENT - approximately 30% of the role
# Assistance with maintenance of Document Templates using Word Merge features 

B.3 MARKETING SUPPORT - approximately 30% of the role
# Assist with Marketing activities 

Essential skills and attributes include:

# Six months experience working with an offshore team speaking and writing in English
# Excellent written and spoken English
# Excellent ability in Microsoft Word
# Willingness to be part of a small team and lighten the load of several busy professionals
# Ability and willingness to follow our well-documented procedures
# Ability to understand the end goal of assigned tasks
# Ability to follow verbal and written instructions
# Ability to effectively communicate with team at all levels
# Comfortable to work in an on-screen environment – we run a paperless office
# Client and Team focussed

# Advanced computer skills are essential, and you will be tested prior to interview

There are always opportunities for advancement for star performers.

C WHO ARE WE?

Our CEO has two businesses – Cascade Accounting & Tax and Wise Owl Legal. This role will work across both businesses. We value people who are self-motivated, great communicators and keen to learn new things. Process automation is paramount, and you need to have a can-do attitude towards computers.

WORK FROM HOME REQUIREMENTS

# Quiet place to work away from family activities where you can focus on tasks assigned to you;
# High speed internet connection and back up 
# Laptop or desktop computer: 
- with processor of i5 or higher or AMD 5 equivalent; 
- a minimum of 8 GB of RAM; 
- Hard Disk drive less than70% full;
# A minimum of Two screens of at least 21 inches to effectively work on assigned tasks. It is preferable to have a laptop and TWO additional monitors of at least 21 inches in size. 
# Licenced copies of Windows and Microsoft Office
# Extended computer keyboard with separate number pad
# Noise cancelling headphones
# Desk and Chair that is ergonomically effective for comfort and safety while working. 

D PERKS AND BENEFITS

We pay in PHP directly to your bank account every second week for the preceding fortnight. Pay is based in AU Dollars and paid fortnightly direct to your bank account in PHP. 
On completion of your 6 months’ probation, you will be entitled to pro-rata of 13th month pay.
We accrued 7% of your time worked as annual leave and 3.5 % of your time worked as sick leave; you are paid for all gazetted Australian (Brisbane) Public Holidays that fall on your work days.
We have a Christmas shutdown, generally of about 2 weeks.

E HOW TO GET OUR ATTENTION

To apply for this rewarding opportunity, submit your application to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line “VA Superstar - ”

Our scanning is generally fairly fast. If you get our attention, we will send you some short personality tests and some written questions before inviting you to an interview.

To apply for this rewarding opportunity, you need to include:

1) Current Resume

Your resume that includes all work and study in the last 5 years plus a summary of any prior work. We are interested in all of your work, not just the highlights you think apply.

2) A covering letter that tells me about:

a) When you realised you had a passion for working as a Virtual Assistant and how that happened;
b) An example where you have worked in English and had significant contract with people outside the Philippines;
c) An example of how your attitude toward technology has added value to a work/study situation
d) An example of Your skills to manage assigned tasks and meet deadlines;
e) The best thing you have done in each Word & Excel and how you added value to the project this task was part of;
f) Your favourite subject you have studied and what you liked about it and the strategies you used to achieve success;
g) An example of your can-do attitude solving a problem.

3) A Short Video

Please make a short video of 30-60 seconds using your mobile phone, and show us your dedicated workspace and how the things in your workspace make you more productive. Tell us how you are going to keep your work space confidential from other members of your household and maintain our client’s confidentiality.

Our websites are:

karenmcdonald.online/

title: Full-stack Web Developer, UI/UX Designer, Senior Project Managers, Software QA Automation Engineer, Senior Software Engi
description:
Job Title: Senior Project Manager / Software QA Automation Engineer / Senior Software Engineer / Software Architect

Job Description:

We are seeking highly skilled professionals to join our team and contribute to the development of an innovative web platform focused on scientific research and investment. As a Senior Project Manager / Software QA Automation Engineer / Senior Software Engineer / Software Architect, you will play a critical role in the successful delivery of this project.

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, scope, and requirements.
- Lead the planning, execution, and monitoring of the project, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.
- Provide technical guidance and architectural expertise in designing and developing scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications.
- Drive the implementation of automated testing frameworks and processes to ensure the quality and reliability of the platform.
- Conduct regular code reviews, performance optimizations, and debugging to maintain the integrity and efficiency of the application.
- Foster a collaborative and innovative work environment, promoting knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.
- Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies, advocating for their integration when appropriate.

Requirements:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience in managing complex web development projects, employing Agile methodologies.
- Strong expertise in software testing and quality assurance, including the design and implementation of automated testing frameworks.
- Extensive knowledge of front-end and back-end development, with proficiency in relevant programming languages and frameworks.
- Solid understanding of system architecture principles, design patterns, and best practices.
- Experience in designing and implementing scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to analyze and mitigate risks and bottlenecks.
- Strong communication and leadership abilities, with the aptitude to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience in the field of scientific research or investment platforms.

• Quality Assurance and Testing: Conduct thorough testing of automation solutions to ensure performance and reliability.
• Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Maintain detailed documentation and share knowledge within the team, fostering a collaborative environment.
• User Training and Feedback Integration: Provide training to end-users, support the effective adoption of tools, and incorporate user feedback to refine solutions.
• Project Administration: Manage project budget hours and timelines, and identify tasks that fall outside the project scope, ensuring efficient project execution and resource allocation.

Technical Skills 
• Power Platform Development: At least 2 years of experience in Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate), or strong foundational skills in similar development platforms.
• Data Handling Skills: Basic knowledge in data integration and transformation. Advanced skills are a plus.
• Programming Proficiency: Solid background in at least one programming language (e.g., JavaScript, C#) and familiarity with web technologies (JSON, HTML).
• API Integration: Experience with web services and API integration.
• Quick Learner: Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies, including Microsoft Power Platform tools.
• Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Certifications: Microsoft Certifications (PL-200, PL-400, PL-900) are beneficial but not required

Critical Competencies 
• Problem-solving mindset 
• Strong collaboration and communication skills 
• Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.
• Demonstrated ability to work independently and as part of a team to achieve project goals.
• Business awareness of how IT relates to business strategy and goals.
• Self-motivated with the ability to work in a fast-moving environment.

title: Operations Assistant
description:
Immediate Hire: Operations Assistant

Immigrowth is a leading business plan provider in North America that sets investors up for success by providing a business plan which focuses on specific purpose business writing and financial forecasting.

We are currently seeking an Operations Assistant (CPA preferred) who has a minimum of 2 years of experience in a similar role. You enjoy taking on new challenges and efficiently getting work done. You’re a team player with excellent English communication skills and you are looking for an opportunity to work in a dynamic environment.

This is a great opportunity to utilize your communication and interpersonal skills to influence at all levels in a dynamic organization. Our business is actively growing, with the opportunity to take on more responsibilities and pay, based on performance.

Role Responsibilities
- Organizes and maintains daily emails of the organization;
- Provides administrative support to the CEO to ensure efficient business operations (e.g. sending of new leads to the delivery team and confirmation of the project assumptions);
- Assists in the preparation and sending of invoices;
- Assists in the collection of payments;
- Assists in the preparation and sending out of legal agreements based on the existing pricing template;

- Liaises with the CEO and handles requests and queries from managers and staff; and
- Assist and support with ad hoc tasks as required

We're looking for someone amazing to work with us for the long term. If you're looking for the same old, same old then this won't be for you.

Qualifications
- Expert in both written and verbal English communication skills;
- Attention to detail and problem-solving skills;
- Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask.

Preferably
- Experienced Accountant (CPA preferred), Financial Management, or other related professions;
- Can work 4 hours a day (between 06:00 AM to 10:00 AM Pacific Standard Time);
- Proven experience for a minimum of at least 2 years experience in an Operations Assistant role
- Knowledgeable or willing to be trained in the following tools/technology: Asana, Slack, Webflow, Pipedrive, Stripe, Gmail, GSuite (Word, Excel, PPT).

Why apply with Immigrowth?

title: Klaviyo Email Marketing Specialist
description:

title: Zapier Expert
description:
About DebtHammer

DebtHammer is a dynamic technology startup on a mission to help millions of families get out of debt. Joining now presents an excellent opportunity to play a key role in the growth story of DebtHammer and work alongside the company's Founder. Although our team is currently small, we are scaling fast!


Join our dynamic team as we seek an accomplished Automation Engineer - Zapier to drive efficiency and innovation in our workflows. As a key contributor, you will play a pivotal role in automating processes using Zapier, ensuring seamless integrations, and enhancing overall operational excellence. If you have a proven track record in automation and a knack for optimizing workflows, we invite you to be a part of our forward-thinking team!

Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled Zapier Expert to join our team and play a key role in automating the process of data entry and reporting from various platforms into Google Sheets. The ideal candidate should possess a deep understanding of Zapier and have the ability to seamlessly connect and automate data transfers from multiple platforms, including but not limited to Meta (Facebook and Instagram ads manager), Mightyscout, TikTok Ads Manager, Google Analytics, Shopify, Google Ads Manager, Triple Whale, ClickUp, Statlas, Klaviyo, and more.

Responsibilities:

Immediate need: We are looking for somebody to help document over 100 Zaps (from Zapier) that we currently use.
Future need: We would like to have somebody who can help us rapidly develop future Zaps.
- Develop and maintain efficient Zapier connections for seamless data automation.
- Automate connections between platforms and Google Sheets for reporting purposes.
- Pull data from various platforms, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
- Create automated workflows to populate Google Sheets with data from different sources.
- Monitor and maintain data integrations, troubleshoot, and resolve any issues that may arise.
- Ensure data security and compliance with best practices.

title: Google Workspace Expert - Consultant
description:
Job Title: Google Workspace Expert/Consultant 

Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Google Workspace Expert/Consultant specializing in Chromebook management to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for optimizing and managing our organization's Chromebook fleet within the Google Workspace environment. This role requires deep expertise in Google Workspace administration, Chrome OS, and a proactive approach to enhancing end-user productivity.

Responsibilities:

Google Workspace Administration:

Manage and administer Google Workspace applications and services to ensure seamless collaboration and productivity.
Implement and enforce security policies, access controls, and user permissions within the Google Workspace environment.
Chromebook Deployment and Configuration:

Oversee the deployment of Chromebooks to end-users, ensuring proper configuration and setup.
Develop and maintain standardized Chromebook configurations to meet organizational requirements.
Chrome OS Management:

Stay up-to-date with the latest Chrome OS features, updates, and best practices.
Troubleshoot and resolve Chromebook-related issues, providing timely support to end-users.
Integration and Automation:

Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to integrate Google Workspace with other systems and tools.
Implement automation scripts to streamline repetitive tasks and enhance efficiency.

Training and Documentation:
Conduct training sessions for end-users on Google Workspace and Chromebook usage.
Create comprehensive documentation for standard operating procedures and troubleshooting guides.

Security and Compliance:
Monitor and enhance security measures to protect against data breaches and unauthorized access.
Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and industry standards.
Requirements:



Education: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field.

Experience:
Minimum of 5 years of experience in Google Workspace administration.
Proven experience in Chromebook management and optimization.

Certifications are a plus
Google Workspace Administrator Certification (desired).
Additional relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA, ITIL) are a plus.

Skills:
Proficiency in administering Google Workspace applications and services.
Strong understanding of Chrome OS features, policies, and configurations.
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
Scripting skills (e.g., Google Apps Script) for automation.

title: Real Estate Wholesale Specialist (commission)
description:
Looking for someone that is ready to take the next step in their "VA" or sales career. 
If you are good at your work in cold calls, text, email for real estate and ready to start earning more for your efforts and experience this is the job for you. We are a company that pays for performance and effort. No one is on the company clock and no one makes a "salary".

Skills to have:
Fluent Cultural English. **You will need to be able to comprehend and understand English spoken in America.**
Wholesale Real Estate: at least 1 year in appointment setting and purchase offering.
Skip Tracing: be able to know how to find people phone and email with provided name and address.
Worked in a CRM: we use a version of GHL to handle leads, emails, calls, sms, automations.

Be organized. Be able to manage calendar effectively.

This is a commission only position. For every house that is sold, you will earn $500. 
You work as much or little as you want to make. We do have an expectation of 10 appointments and 1 signed contract per week, starting on the 3rd week. We love to have fun and make LOTS of MONEY. Just because you live in another country does not mean you have to make wages from that country. This will be our first hire from the Philippines. 

If you are not comfortable with earning a commission, DO NOT APPLY. We will not entertain applicants looking to be paid for their time. We pay on production. If you are not comfortable, it is likely you do not have enough experience or you do not have the ability to produce revenue. 
If you are ready to move forward and work together, let's talk. I am very easy going however, time is money and I want to make sure to get SERIOUS applicants. So, if you are still reading this. Look forward to speaking with you and building wealth with you.

To reduce spam and prove you are human, you will need to add at the beginning of your message, Show Me The Money.

title: Marketing Ads Manager
description:
Expert English writing skill is required for this role, intermediate to expert speaking, skill is also required for this role. 

Description
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Marketing Ads Manager to join our law practice. As the Marketing Ads Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing strategic advertising campaigns to effectively promote our firm and increase brand awareness. You will collaborate with our marketing team to create compelling advertisements that resonate with our target audience and drive engagement.

The successful candidate will have a proven track record in managing successful digital advertising campaigns, with a strong understanding of marketing best practices and the ability to analyze campaign performance metrics. Additionally, you will possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills and be able to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

Responsibilities
Develop and execute innovative advertising campaigns across various channels, including search engines, social media platforms, and online display networks.
Create and optimize ad copy, creatives, and landing pages to drive maximum conversions.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance data to identify trends and make data-driven decisions to optimize campaign performance and budget allocation.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement integrated marketing strategies that align with the firm's overall objectives.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in online advertising to ensure our campaigns remain innovative and competitive.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify new opportunities and stay ahead of industry trends.
Manage relationships with external advertising agencies and vendors to ensure campaign deliverables are met on time and within budget.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, or a related field.
Proven experience in managing successful digital advertising campaigns, preferably within the legal industry.
Strong understanding of digital marketing metrics and the ability to analyze and interpret data to drive campaign optimization.
Proficient in using digital advertising platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong project management and organizational skills.
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment.
Proactive and self-motivated with a strong attention to detail.
Knowledge of SEO best practices and content marketing strategies is a plus.
Familiarity with marketing automation platforms is a plus.
Demonstrated ability to think creatively and develop innovative advertising strategies.
A bachelors in business or marketing or higher is required for this role.

We request intermediate, or expert level experience in the area of online paid ad marketing for this role. This is an ongoing project based role, you set your own hours and would be paid for your work on completion of each project or meeting of milestone of each project.

Please send your résumé, a cover letter of your achievements, and what you would do for our firm, and what you could contribute to our firm, along with a portfolio or examples of your past work, and real world examples show how you have helped other small businesses market the sale of services in the US.

title: Technical SEO Strategist & Developer
description:
My Biz Niche is a full-service digital agency specializing in custom website design, development, and online marketing.

We are currently looking for a talented Technical SEO Strategist who will be responsible for assisting the On-Page SEO Manager in growing and optimizing organic presence such as increasing rankings and increasing organic leads across Google and other search engines utilizing all on-site SEO strategies. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Improving and Enhancing All On-Page SEO Tactics 

- Analyze and understand complex SEO issues or needs and produce specific action plans to improve client’s SEO.
- Fulfillment of reporting and interpreting data into meaningful analysis that leads to a strategic action plan to improve SEO. 
- Know and keep pace with SEO, search engine, and internet marketing industry trends and developments and report changes and strategy updates as needed.
- Conduct keyword research (local & national) and mapping of the keywords on a website by planning the information architecture.
- Optimize and set up all meta tags and URL structure.
- Implement technical SEO including: installing ALT Tags, generating Dynamic Sitemaps & fixing any Sitemap errors, submit sitemaps to Google, testing Robots.txt file, fixing issues with the file & ensuring the website is crawlable by search engines, writing Schema code and adding it into the header.
- Determine if and when new service pages or location pages are needed.
- Set up Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics (including GA4) including Page Goals and Filtered Views, Search Console and Bing Webmasters.
- Use a multitude of SEO tools including Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, etc. to audit websites, gather data to be analyzed, and analyze the results in order to determine an SEO plan tailored to each client.
- Create Schema JSON-LD markup code (Local Business, Individual Business Review, Business Aggregate Review etc.).
- Meet deadlines for all stages, tasks, and life cycle of the SEO project.
- Endorse projects and tasks to the SEO manager for final approval and sign-off.
- Understand HTML/CSS/JS, Schema, DOM, page speed / critical rendering path, and SSL.
- Leverage advanced workflows for identifying opportunities at scale (such as APIs, SQL, Python, and advanced Excel functions) working with large and complex data sets (examples include log files, crawl data, and database records).

2. Perform Ongoing Monthly Maintenance

- Proactively evaluate our client’s websites on a regular basis to ensure there are no technical issues or errors by manually checking and using tools like search console, and task out any necessary fixes or make recommendations for improvements.
- Monitor all facets of each SEO project to keep up with optimization as new pages get added to the website, and/or changes are made to the site.

3. Read and Analyze SEO Data and Improve On-Page Performance

- Read and analyze website performance data such as Bounce Rate, Average Time spent on top pages, Page Speed etc. in Google Analytics and create a detailed and comprehensive report explaining your findings, any positive impacts, and any recommendations for improving SEO for each account.
- Give suggestions for site improvements based on the analysis of site performance metrics.
- Assist the SEO and On-Page SEO Manager in putting out monthly SEO reports with detailed notes and future recommendations.
- Formulate a plan of action for accounts that experience drastic fluctuations in traffic, links, or other metrics that are being monitored.

4. Cross-functional Collaboration

- Effectively collaborate and work with cross-functionally with teams and guide them through the lifecycle of a project
- Make recommendations to improve processes that will help retain existing clients, attract new business, and/or increase efficiencies within our team.
- Serve as a liaison between Account Managers regarding staffing requirements, deadlines, project status, project scope, content and asset needs, and client requirements. 
- Facilitate effective communication and coordination between project teams, stakeholders, and other departments to ensure that everyone is aligned and informed about project progress.
- Collaborate with SEO managers and account management to recommend necessary improvements for client’s SEO account health.

Qualifications:

> 3-5+ years proven experience in the same role 
> Preferably with development experience (html, css, js, wordpress, shopify, etc.)
> Proficiency in SEO tools, such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, AHrefs, SEMrush, or similar platforms.
> Solid understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.
> Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
> Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
> Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
> Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively.
> Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and advancements in technical SEO.
> Comfortable using Hubstaff to keep track work hours

Our work schedule is from Tuesday to Saturday, 6:00 AM - 2:00 PM Philippine time. We use Hubstaff to time track work hours and monitor productivity output.

We have paid leaves, holiday pay, performance bonus, 13th month pay and team training and development.

If you think you are the one we’re looking for kindly send the following:
1. Latest Resume w/ photo
2. Portfolio
3. OnlineJobs.ph Profile Link

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Digital Sales Funnel Specialist to join our team. As a Digital Sales Funnel Specialist, your primary responsibility will be to design, set up, and optimize sales funnels for selling digital products. You will play a crucial role in automating the entire sales process, from capturing leads to converting them into paying customers. Additionally, you will be responsible for managing and running effective advertising campaigns to drive traffic and maximize conversions.

Responsibilities:

1. Design and Set Up Sales Funnels:
- Conduct thorough market research to identify target audience, demographics, and pain points.
- Develop a deep understanding of our digital products and their unique selling points.
- Design and create sales funnels tailored to specific products, utilizing proven strategies and industry best practices.
- Implement lead capture pages, sales pages, order forms, upsells, downsells, and thank you pages within the funnel.
- Ensure seamless integration of the funnel with payment gateways, email marketing software, and other necessary tools.

2. Automate Sales Process:
- Implement automation tools and techniques to streamline the sales process and maximize efficiency.
- Set up email sequences and automation workflows to nurture leads and convert them into paying customers.
- Implement retargeting strategies to engage with potential customers who have shown interest but haven't made a purchase.

3. Run Advertising Campaigns:
- Develop and execute effective advertising campaigns across various platforms, such as social media, search engines, and display networks.
- Conduct thorough keyword research and audience targeting to optimize ad performance.
- Monitor campaign metrics, including click-through rates, conversion rates, and return on ad spend (ROAS).
- Continuously optimize campaigns to improve performance and maximize ROI.
- Stay updated with industry trends and changes in advertising platforms to ensure competitiveness and effectiveness.

4. Analyze and Optimize Funnel Performance:
- Regularly review funnel metrics and performance data to identify areas for improvement.
- Conduct A/B testing to optimize landing pages, sales copy, and overall funnel performance.
- Analyze customer behavior and sales patterns to identify opportunities for upsells, cross-sells, and improvements in conversion rates.
- Utilize analytics tools to track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to funnel performance.

Requirements:

- Proven track record in designing and implementing successful sales funnels for digital products.
- Strong understanding of marketing principles, customer psychology, and sales conversion techniques.
- Proficient in using funnel-building software and automation tools (e.g., ClickFunnels, Leadpages, ActiveCampaign, etc.).
- Experience in running advertising campaigns on platforms such as Facebook Ads, Google Ads, or other relevant platforms.
- Solid analytical skills to track and optimize funnel performance using tools like Google Analytics.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, and development.
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to overcome challenges and achieve desired results.
- Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision.

If you are passionate about digital sales funnels, automation, and driving revenue growth through targeted advertising, we would love to hear from you. Apply today and join our dynamic team!

title: Onboarding and Integrations Specialist
description:
Job Title: Onboarding and Integrations Specialist



Job Overview:

We are looking for a skilled Onboarding and Integrations Specialist to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in setting up and customizing client accounts on the Go High Level (GHL) platform, building Google Ads campaigns, creating integrations using webhooks, and providing technical assistance to clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in GHL, specifically in building automations and integrations, and will play a key role in enhancing our clients' experience and success.



Key Responsibilities:



Client Account Setup on Go High Level:

Efficiently set up and configure new client accounts on the GHL platform.
Tailor account settings and features to meet specific client requirements.


Google Ads Campaign Setup:

Build Google Ads campaigns within client accounts, following provided step-by-step instructions.
Ensure accounts are set up correctly and ready for hand off to the media buying team. This would include setting up conversion tracking and changing customer assets.
There is NO MEDIA BUYING in this role.


Client Integrations Support:

Develop and maintain integrations from GHL to clients' CRM systems using webhooks.
Troubleshoot and resolve any integration issues, ensuring seamless connectivity and data flow.


Technical Client Support:

Provide timely and effective technical assistance to clients regarding their GHL accounts and integrations.
Develop and maintain support documentation and guides to assist clients in navigating and utilizing platform features.


Experience and Qualifications:

Minimum 1 Year Experience with Go High Level:
Demonstrated experience in building automations and integrations within the GHL platform.
Proficiency in configuring and customizing GHL to meet client needs.
Technical Skills:
Familiarity with Google Ads campaign setup and management.
Experience in using webhooks for integration purposes.
Strong problem-solving skills and technical acumen.
Communication and Customer Service:
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
Proven ability to assist clients with technical needs and provide clear, concise guidance.


Why Join Us?

As part of our team, you'll have the opportunity to work in a collaborative environment, where your skills and expertise in onboarding and integration will directly contribute to our clients' success. We value innovation, dedication, and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.

title: Virtual Assistant – Organizational Master and HubSpot Wizard
description:
Howdy – thank you for considering this opportunity to work together. 

I’m a one-man band and have gotten to the point where I’m too busy and things are falling through the cracks. I’m a broker that specializes in helping people find quality franchises to buy and build. 

I’m searching for someone who can help me organize my business and ensure the people we’re working with are getting the level of service they need. 

For instance, there are probably some typos in this post. You’ll help me avoid that in the future ????

Ideal candidates for this position will have experience building out basic HubSpot functionality, be an organization master, have strong communication skills, speak fluent English, and want to have fun working together. We literally help people change their life through entrepreneurship (which I think is pretty cool). 

Here’s a rundown of the type of work to expect…

HubSpot Administration 
• Build out the basic functionality of HubSpot to help streamline communications and pipeline management
• Simple stuff like email templates, basic automation, and other ideas you have to tap into the power of the system to create efficiencies

Pipeline Support
• Support me in managing my pipeline of candidates and the various stages of due diligence they’re in
• Assist in scheduling people who are interested in learning more about starting a non-food franchise. All inquiries are inbound so there will be some call and email follow-up to candidates who want to schedule a call
• Also touch base with past candidates for check-ins

Social Media Management 
• Post already curated content on social media platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, etc)
• Manage the creation of new content through vendors and me
• Find new guests for my podcast (called Franchise Masters) 
• Also, run key metrics each week to track marketing activities

Special Project Management 
• From time to time, there will be special projects I cook up that I’ll need help with

In sum, I’m looking for someone who can help me stay organized and leverage HubSpot to create more efficiency, so ultimately, we can help more people figure out if there’s a franchise out there that’s right for them. 

If you apply, please share the relevant experience you feel you have for this position.

Thank you!

title: Launch Manager
description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:
• Work with the CEO to develop our launch calendar, oversee funnel mapping + all launch activities to ensure success, and manage the day-to-day marketing efforts that grow the company
• Coordinating funnel mapping to plan launches and brand / community-building efforts, including scoping and monitoring workflows 
• Manage the customer journey, including creating the best customer experience, increasing referrals and retention, maximizing lifetime value, etc.
• Oversee our content strategy, including email marketing + newsletters, weekly podcast, and development of key assets like books or quizzes to generate leads
• Support the CEO in tracking KPIs across all marketing channels to identify areas of opportunity, weakness, etc.
• Support the marketing team to ensure everyone has the training and collaboration from leadership and teammates they need to excel in their performance
• Create new products in Kajabi and upload content to (call replays, videos, workbooks) 
• Create opt-in pages for freebies, schedule emails and create segments in Flodesk
• Use Stripe in checking weekly overdue payments, closing out any 
• Build out new projects in Asana with each task efficiently that needs completed,
• Create SOPs and Loom video trainings, write down step-by-step instructions of everything they are doing to be able to build out systems 
• Updating systems for launches (i.e. funnel key, which will be shown upon hiring)
• Edit existing landing pages with updated copy and pictures, optimized for mobile and desktop on Show It
• Ability to create and design new landing pages 
• Calendar Scheduling for clients & sending calendar invites through Calendly, ensuring all calls are presented accurately on the calendar
• Scheduling Zoom calls for group coaching containers
• Create new calendar block times (for example, for discovery calls)
• Create & manage facebook groups, when applicable
• Respond to inquiries for podcast booking
• Respond to inquiries for Rachel to be a guest on other podcasts, speaking arrangements
• Respond to client inquiries
• Respond to ShowIt website notifications when applicable 
• Edit existing graphics & create new graphics when appropriate in Canva
• Attend group coaching calls to manage breakout rooms, chatbox, or any administrative things (like pulling links etc) during the call time 


This is a leadership role and an executing role. You will need an expansive understanding of the various roles within a marketing team so you can provide the leadership that helps everyone to excel. 

In addition, you will be responsible for ongoing training and development for yourself and the team to keep your skills sharp and our efforts successful. The company devotes significant resources to training and equipping the team


EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS REQUIRED:

• Has 2+ years of project management experience with 6 figure and/or 7 figure launches (requirement)
• Have a strong background in Direct Response to manage launches and company growth, with a strong working knowledge of • the role of powerful storytelling both visually and with words
• Be well-versed in digital marketing tools + best practices, including SEO / SEM, email marketing , funnel and course development in tools like LearnDash / Clickfunnels / Kajabi, and working with a tech stack to include zapier, Zoho, etc.
• Have experience managing social media and advertising projects, to include copywriting, design and implementation across marketing channels
• Have website / email marketing experience working in programs like WordPress, WooCommerce, and SendLane, plus if you have ShowIt experience
• Experience with ShowIt is a plus but not required
• Prior experience in customer support/customer service management and billing is a plus.
• Commitment to a trial project of 3 months with potential for a longer-term role.
• Have experience with Creative Directing, telling stories through campaigns driven by direct response marketing principles and a strong grasp of why people buy
• Understand programming automation logic (if / then)Have technical experience working in social media management, to include Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Linkedin, Pinterest (loading and optimizing content, community management, etc)
• Be experienced and comfortable with remote team tools like Slack, Asana, Trello, Google Suite, LastPass, and Zoom 
• Be a self-starter who thrives in a team environment and is wired to “mark things off the list” and get projects completed ahead of deadlines
• Proactively identify productivity issues and meet challenges with a solutions-oriented mindset to create results; courage to bring productivity or performance challenges to leadership for support, as needed
• Ability to make sense of metrics and see where there are problems or opportunities in our numbers
• Be comfortable with onboarding and training new teaUpgrade to see actual infombers, monitoring their performance for excellence, managing weekly 1:1s with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers and managing reviews and corrective action / performance planning, as needed
• Ability to multitask and manage multiple projects at once, with ease
• Demonstrate a solid typing WPM (ideally 55 wpm+)
• Excellent english skills, with the ability to communicate well verbally and written
• Have excellent people skills, with an ability to work productively with many types of people and to build great rapport with direct reports
==================================================================================================

TECH REQUIREMENTS:

Computer - at least i5 or equivalent with 8gb RAM
Internet Speed - At least 50 MBPS Download speed
Job Type: Full-time
Schedule: Sunday-Thursday 2pm-10pm CST// Monday -Friday 4am- 12pm PHT
Salary Range: Php 60,000 - Php 90,000 monthly, Depending on experience

==================================================================================================

title: Email Marketing Copywriter
description:
About Us
We are a fully remote email marketing agency headquartered in Los Angeles, growing rapidly (4.3x in 2022), and looking for an exceptional A-player, Email Copywriter to elevate our team further. 

Our Beliefs: 
??We uphold the highest standards of excellence and seek A-players only. If you're ready to be challenged, grow, and have immense impact on the road to an 8-figure company, this is the place for you. 
Work Hard, Play Hard: We believe that our employees are our most important asset. Knowing the demands of agency life, we’ve sculpted policies to ensure our team experiences great work-life balance and tackles each day with an excitement and vigor to go deep for clients. This means you get a 4-day work-week, 20 days PTO, 100% remote work policy, and flexible work hours (ET/PT) that adapt to your life.
Culture of HEART: Every action we take and decision we make is rooted in our core values: Honesty, Excellence, a Positive Attitude, Results, and Trustworthiness.
Empowerment and Responsibility: With the freedom we provide, we trust in your self-responsibility. The thing that binds us all? We care deeply. Every teaUpgrade to see actual infomber is integral to our mission, sharing a deep commitment to our company, our clients, and creating a ripple effect of positivity.

If this sounds like you, and you maybe even fancy a fresh coconut or piña colada at sunset (irrelevant to the role, but still fun), you might've just found your tribe. Dive deeper below.


Who Are We Looking For?
This role is not a walk in the park. Rather, it’s an opportunity to leave your mark in the growth towards an 8-figure agency. 

An exceptional writer, a master of the English language and someone who cares deeply about company success, and client satisfaction. We’re looking for exceptional, not good. The Lebron James and Serena Williams of copywriting. If you're a marketing psychology savvy, a word magician, creative at heart, and able to emulate any brand voice, we want to hear from you!


The Role
As the Email Copywriter, you'll craft high-converting, creative email marketing content, emulating various brand voices, and ensuring the highest quality of copywriting is delivered. 

Key Responsibilities:


Dive into client brand voice and audience research.
Craft compelling, conversion-focused email content for campaigns and automation funnels based on marketing and consumer psychology. 
Collaborate with email strategists and the head of copywriting, presenting drafts and ideas.
Revise content as needed to meet stakeholder expectations.
Bridge the realms of marketing, sales, and creative content.




Desired Outcomes & Goals Of The Role:
Ensure 100% on-time delivery of grammatically and spelling error-free copy that matches the brand voice. 
Limit revisions to a maximum of one round for 90% of projects.
Maintain a standard where 70% or more of emails written result in above-industry-average conversion rates.

Who Will Be Successful In This Role: 
Obsessed with detail, driven by producing top-quality work.
A masterful writer with a deep command of the English language.
Innately creative with a flair for crafting compelling content.
Embodies humility, drive, kindness, and creativity.
Thrives in dynamic environments; flexible, adaptive, and resilient under pressure.
Exceptionally organized, with a knack for strategic, creative, and analytical thinking.
Self-driven, always ready to proactively address and solve challenges.
Possesses high emotional intelligence with stellar verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills.
Familiar with core marketing psychology principles.

What We Offer:
Work hard, play hard: 4-day work-week (Monday - Thursday)
Work where you want: 100% remote work policy according to ET / PT hours
An exceptional team to work with you can learn from, have fun, and grow with
Flexible PTO
Competitive salary
Learn with us: Company investment in employee growth, e.g., weekly lunch and learns
Grow with us: Internal growth opportunities and the ability to shape a young company's trajectory and culture

title: Are you a rockstar Executive Assistant? Then I want you!

Learning my CRM and various softwares
Responding to emails
Handling clients once they book my show. (emailing contracts, invoices, promotional materials, etc)
Finding email addresses of school, church & corporate prospects on their websites (web or data scraping)
Sending out email campaigns using my online software
Tracking my progress on spreadsheets

REQUIRED SKILLS
Excellent Written English skills (for writing emails, etc) -- without using AI for help. You must understand English spelling and grammar.
Excellent Verbal English skills (although you won't need to be on the phone with clients, you will need to understand me and be able to communicate with me)
Excellent customer service skills (you will be communicating with my clients)

Fast Learner
Pays close attention to detail
Good at following instructions to the letter.
A teachable and fun spirit

BONUS

Ability to video edit or make story videos for Instagram and other socials. (not the main priority at all)

WORK TIMES FROM 9AM TO 5PM CENTRAL TIME (CST)

10am to 6pm CST might also work
I will need you to be able to immediately respond to emails and leads that come in during these times.

COMMUNICATION
We will most likely use whatsapp for quick messages.
Other: Zoom, Asana, etc
You'll send a daily report through email, detailing completed and ongoing tasks.

ABOUT ME:
I have been a full-time professional magician for 30 years. I primarily present programs for school, church and corporate events. I am looking to build a team to grow, as I have now become too busy to handle everything myself.

I’m open to fresh ideas to improve consistency and efficiency and hope to grow fast in the next year.

5. Review our Competitor’s Advertisements, Websites & Social Media to determine areas where we should focus.

6. Utilize data mining tools to identify prospects in specific geographic areas and specific industries.

7. Help us craft effective marketing emails / messages for those prospects

8. Help us to optimize all of our social media pages and determine if we should consider using LinkedIn Sales Navigator and/or any similar tools to assist our marketing efforts.

If you are an agency or a developer with all of these skills please contact me and provide the following information.

*** IMPORTANT - if you do not answer these 5 questions your reply will be discarded ***
1. Do you work alone or manage an agency?
2. Please provide links to the websites of 3 clients that you have assisted with search engine advertising in the past year.
3. Which tools do you use to determine the effectiveness of your A/B testing?
4. Please list any third-party software tools that you use for data mining of prospects
5. What is your desired hourly rate?

title: US Recruiting Sourcer / Recruitment Sourcing
description:
Are you interested in a job where …
- you get paid every 2 weeks
- transfer fees are covered
- you are treated as a person
- made to feel a part of the team
- and have plenty of opportunities to grow?

We are looking for an AWESOME Recruiting Sourcer, Researcher, and General Virtual Assistant to join our AWESOME team! Someone who is highly vibrant, optimistic, a quick learner, tech-savvy, resourceful, and self-motivated with discipline.

# About the company:

STOITECH ( stoitech . com ) is a Canada-based full-time permanent Executive Search recruitment agency with a simple mission: To drive growth for its Health Tech, Biotech, and Artificial Intelligence clients by hiring from the Top 10% of talent in Sales, Engineering, Product, & Leadership.

STOITECH was formed with the intention to deliver a superior recruiting service to clients in the USA and Canada – one that leverages tools and automation, an agile team, and focused execution of great procedures to scale, grow, and deliver greater value to serve its exclusive clients.

With great procedures, a can-do attitude, and plenty of ambition, STOITECH is positioned as a leading recruitment firm for tech companies, healthcare companies, and a variety of industries in-between.

# Why should you join our team?

Ilhan Kudeki, the Founder/CEO of STOITECH was mentored by reputable staffing industry professionals and leaders over the past 3 years. He is ready to share his wisdom and knowledge to accelerate a new teaUpgrade to see actual infomber's growth and earning potential as a remote virtual assistant.

Ilhan created STOITECH to implement the best and latest practices in recruitment outreach, using automation and personalized messaging. We are growing a lean, top-quality, and highly profitable recruitment agency – one that makes a difference in the lives of candidates and client businesses alike.

At STOITECH take pride in being people-first, excellent operations, and constant and never-ending improvement, so if you would love to work with an energetic, fun and challenging business that continues to grow, then this role is for you.

# About the role:

As a General VA, you will be responsible for any number of research, communication, operational, data entry, and administrative tasks to assist in the day-to-day, week-to-week, and month-to-month operations of this business.

# Role Type:
- Full-time role, once trained
- Start part-time during training (must be available to work during Eastern Time US hours 9am-6pm with a break factored in

# Responsibilities:

• Work with LinkedIn Recruiter RPS and other search platforms to find the very best candidate leads for our engineering, sales/marketing, operations, and leadership positions
• Manage candidate and contact lead lists and spreadsheets
• Manage inboxes and organize replies, according to set procedures
• Update entries in our Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and CRM
• Research tasks (LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, and job boards)
• Maintain a calendar and set up meetings
• Keep your task list up-to-date in our task management tools
• Communicate clearly, effectively, and professionally with your managers and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
• Handle candidate and client inquiry emails and messages
• Prepare and send out email campaigns and newsletters
• Data entry - CRM, spreadsheets
• Excellent customer service skills
• Liaison between you and other teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
• Set-up social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube)
• Manage and update social media accounts
• Document and update procedures (this will be an important part of the role – so we will prefer candidate with strong English skills)

# Qualifications:

You are …

• Self-driven. You have superior organizational skills, integrity and great follow through on tasks. You have the ability to work remotely and still be incredibly successful.
• Naturally curious. You are innovative, extremely creative, and constantly looking for ways to improve upon things.
• Obsessive about candidate experience. You are self-aware, well-spoken on the phone, and eloquent in emails. You’re respectful of the candidate and the stressful process a job hunt can be.
• Fun. You are a friendly person who can talk to anyone; you are flexible, love people, and excited to help build something awesome and share it with the world.
• Motivated. You understand the impact of highly-satisfied, excited customers; and you are slightly obsessive-compulsive about grinding away at issues.
• A utility player. You are willing to help out wherever needed.
• A great communicator. You've worked in strict and disciplined professional environments and bring those standards to every job you work.

You have …

• MUST HAVE: 3+ years working as a recruitment sourcer, working with LinkedIn RPS (Recruiter Professional Services) to find candidate leads for recruitment
• MUST HAVE: Worked searching for candidate leads in tech/engineering, health, marketing, sales, and/or similar candidate leads in the past – building target candidate lead lists
• Great English: written and spoken (Call Centre, BPO experience is a major plus – especially if you were a Manager)
• Excellent computer skills – fast and accurate typing skills, knowledge of keyboard shortcuts, eagerness to learn new tips and tricks fast (super important)
• A fast and reliable computer – 8+ GB RAM, multi-core processor, SSD, fast WiFi
• An extremely reliable internet connection with 50Mbps+ or higher speed
• A backup mobile hotspot when power or Internet fails (10+ Mbps speed)
• A 1080P display (1920x1080 resolution) – or higher
• A quality webcam for team calls, with a nice image
• A quality over-the-ear headset with noise cancellation
• Excellent email/chat communication and telephone skills
• A professional LinkedIn profile (a warm and professional profile pic is important)
• A detail-oriented personality
• Polite, sincere, competent, friendly, and socially intelligent

***This role is also OPEN for applicants with NO EXPERIENCE in Remote Virtual Assistant work, as long as you meet the above qualifications.***

Nice to have (but not required):

• LinkedIn research experience, 1+ years
• LinkedIn connections with North American talent – the more the better
• Experience managing email and chat replies to North American customers in a friendly, sincere, and professional way

# Workload:

• Starts part-time at 20 hours per week for training
• Once trained, it would be full-time work during Eastern Time US hours

# Compensation:

• Starts between $4.00 - 5.00 USD per hour, depending on experience
• COMMISSIONS for performance
• Weekly pay every second Friday!
• We cover the transfer fees
• Salary increases and commissions based on your performance
• End of year bonus (13th Month)

# How to Apply:

Interested applicants, please apply by sending an email to ...

Upgrade to see actual info

...with the subject line "PH General VA Application". Please include the URL to a Loom video with you in the video – 2 minutes max – where you explain why you'd be a great fit for this role, along with one thing you like to do for fun. Make sure to start the video with "Hello Team STOITECH!"

Please note: Applications through other means, including applying on OnlineJobs.ph, will NOT be considered.

title: Digital Marketing Executive
description:
THE ROLE:
This is a unique and lucrative opportunity for an experienced digital marketing executive who will be responsible for planning, implementing, and managing online advertising campaigns to promote our products or services. Your role involves utilizing various digital channels, optimizing ad performance, and analyzing campaign data to drive effective and efficient marketing strategies.


RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Experience with marketing automation tools is an advantage.
- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and basic graphic design is a plus.

title: Marketing Manager
description:
We are looking for a highly creative and efficient Marketing Manager to join our growing team. This individual will be responsible for identifying target audiences and building digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate our clients. This position will also be responsible for optimizing marketing strategies, managing the Marketing department’s budget, overseeing employees, and forecasting. The Marketing Manager will play a key role in promoting Highland Park Lapidary and its services to increase brand awareness and profitability. This position will report directly to the CEO.

This position is 100% remote.

ABOUT THE COMPANY
Our mission is to enable artists, jewelers, and craftspeople to turn their creative visions into reality through the gemstone & glass cutting and polishing arts. For over 30 years it has been our focus to bring the highest quality and most innovative equipment, tools, and processes to all of the lapidary artists worldwide. Combining our love for the lapidary arts along with our decades of experience in the design and use of lapidary equipment provides us with a unique knowledge and experience that we bring to everything we do. We challenge ourselves to be great and the best version of ourselves through individual personal, professional, and financial goals and the impact we have in the lapidary space. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, accountable, results-oriented, transparent, disciplined, and aligned. This company operates internationally and is growing by the day.

OBJECTIVES
• Incorporate the company’s best practices with knowledge of owned, earned, and paid media through design, copy, search engine, email marketing, social media, and paid search capabilities
• Plan and execute all digital marketing from strategy to execution including:
- SEO/SEM campaigns
- Social media campaigns
- Marketing database campaigns
- Email campaigns
- Display advertising campaigns
• Understand and apply emerging trends in digital marketing, mobile marketing, and automation
• Add comments, create strategy, and ensure accuracy to improve department process
• Design, build, and maintain a social media presence including on-brand copywriting and visual applications
• Monitor and optimize all digital marketing campaigns to maximize engagement & overall ROI
• Identify trends and insights to optimize spending and performance and consistently strive to find new solutions and tools for creative growth strategies both effectively and efficiently
• Collaborate with internal teams to build trust and confidence with clients through a remarkable user experience
• Propose additional value-adds in the department process and build out SOPs (standard operating procedures) for the Marketing department
• Perform additional responsibilities as assigned

COMPETENCIES
• Demonstrates experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns
• Possesses extensive knowledge in optimizing landing pages, user funnels, and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns
• Demonstration of expertise in marketing strategy with the ability to gather and link accurate marketing data to future business goals
• Knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in online marketing
• Demonstrates an understanding of leadership expectations
• Possesses excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Ability to analyze data, make observations from numbers and reports, and know how to qualify and deliver results based on data
• Ability to track marketing data and convert it to business ROI
• Demonstrates strong analytic skills and data-driven thinking

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
• Bachelor’s degree in marketing or related area of study, or equivalent work experience
• 4+ years of work experience in marketing, sales, and management
• Substantial experience with customer relationship management (CRM) software (HubSpot), project management software (e.g., Asana), and G Suite (Google Slides and Google Docs)
• Substantial experience with Shopify, eBay, Google, and Amazon marketplaces
• Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments a plus

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS
• Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer

COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY
As an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce, Highland Park Lapidary recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.

description:
Company Overview:

title: Experienced Virtual Assistant & Customer Support Superstar @ Best Mate Dog Training!
description:
Hello! Please only apply if you have at least 1+ years of virtual assistant experience and speak fluent English.

This job is for 20 hours a week, with potential to grow.

About us:

Best Mate Dog Training teaches dog owners across Australia and New Zealand how to get their dog to listen and behave reliably, without using treats, through our online course Canine Chaos to Calm.

We’re passionate about helping dog owners to transform their lives with their dogs from frustration and stress to actually enjoying having them around and involving them in all the activities they want to. We’re an exciting small business and growing fast!

We’re looking for an exceptional, hardworking, honest & reliable virtual assistant to assist with technical support, setting up launches and supporting our customers and audience to welcome them into our world and help them find the information they need. 



About the Role:

Working as part of our dynamic, passionate small team, you’ll be responsible for the tasks that are crucial for the running of our business.

You’ll be helping with day-to-day admin tasks, as well as setting up for and assisting with launches (helping thousands of dog owners to feel welcome and find what they need inside our free challenge). 

Which means you’ll need to be reliable (giving people the information you promised and making sure no request is left ignored), and show enthusiasm for helping our audience feel welcome and supported, as well as have the attention to detail and technical know-how to keep the back end of the business (automations, landing pages, emails etc) running smoothly. 

We work hard and take pride in our work and the transformations we can help dog owners with. There are strict deadlines for everything and accuracy and reliability are crucial. So this is a GREAT job with lots of scope to grow with the company, but you must be willing to commit and go all-in 100%!



Here are some of the tasks that this role will include…


During launchUpgrade to see actual info up to a launch:

• Updating sales pages, landing pages, forms, automations, email sequences etc to ensure that dates/tags etc are all correct for the new run-through of the launch (we re-use a lot of content/processes, so this is about updating key parts of systems that are already in place – accuracy and attention to detail are crucial here!)

• Scheduling posts and videos, creating the pop-up Facebook group for the free challenge we run during the launch period.

• Responding to comments on Facebook and Instagram ads – answering questions (using scripts provided), deleting and blocking trolls quickly etc – making sure that all are replied to within 24 hours (by you or the team) and that nothing is missed.

• Responding to messages in the Facebook inbox, answering any questions that are covered by the scripts provided, and filtering the rest to be answered by the dog trainer.

• Responding to comments in the pop-up Facebook group where people are introducing themselves/their dogs, to make them feel welcome, and help them find any extra information that might be relevant to them (for example, if they have two dogs in their introduction photo, then you’d give them the link to a post about doing the challenge with two dogs)

• Filtering emails in the inbox – answering the ones that are covered by the scripts provided and filtering the rest to be answered by the dog trainer – making sure that all are replied to within 24 hours (by you or the team) and that nothing is missed.

• Admit Facebook join requests based on their answers to the questions



Outside of launch time:

• Editing videos (very basic editing – trimming the start and end of videos etc)

• Writing time-stamps for the weekly Trainer Q&A video (a summary of what’s covered and where it appears in the video), then uploading the video and sending out an email to tell course members that it’s available

• Helping with basic SEO (e.g. keyword research to find keywords with high search and low difficulty on a given topic)

• Customer service – as per the launch tasks, managing the email inbox, facebook message inbox, replying to comments and emails that are covered by scripts and filtering the remainder for the dog trainer to answer.

• Helping with finding and publishing content/comments/reviews from current members to share publicly as a success story.

• Scheduling social media posts and updating the Squarespace website with new posts etc.

• Assisting with technology set up, editing pages, automations etc when new products/systems etc are introduced/altered.

• Writing step by step instructions for new tasks, based off of screen recordings of that task.

• Admit/cross check Facebook group join requests for the paid course members only group.



About You:

We’re looking for someone who has a proven track record in a virtual assistant role, including tasks involving technology (online course portal, landing pages, email sequences and automations etc) and customer service (responding to emails, replying to >Facebook comments with answers to questions etc), ideally within an online business / online course environment.

You must:

• Have amazing communication and interpersonal skills

• Be hard working, honest and dedicated. 

• Be proactive and able to think for yourself – so you can notice if something is missing from instructions etc/something doesn’t seem right and let us know so we can fix it.

• Be responsible for the success of the tasks you take on, able to double check, proof-read, and ensure links etc are working as they should before marking the task as complete.

• Have awesome attention to detail and high standards for accuracy and quality of work – the little things can make a big difference to the running of the business and our customer’s experience. 

• Have excellent English, and able to converse naturally. Our communication style with our customers and audience is friendly and warm and relatively casual, while still maintaining professionalism, which requires a good grasp of the English language to do well. 

Importantly, you must be tech savvy (step by step instructions are provided for tasks, but previous understanding/use of similar software is required, as this role is for an experienced VA!). 

Some of the tools we use include Kartra (which is similar to Kajabi/ActiveCampaign/LeadPages), Loom, Canva, Integrately (similar to Zapier), G Suite, Publer, Squarespace, plus the traditional things like email, YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram.


This job is in New Zealand time (Auckland/Wellington).

A good internet connection is required.

A Computer or Laptop is needed (tablets, phones, and other devices are not sufficient).



How to Apply:

A thriving team, and having roles who fit the people in them is super important to the success of a business, as well as the growth, success and happiness of those who are part of it. Self-awareness, personal development, and playing to an individuals’ strengths are all part of our company values. 

Which is why we ask that you complete a couple of personality assessments as part of the application process and include screenshots of your results in your cover letter. Any applicants that do not include this will not be considered.

Step 1. Take the Enneagram Personality Assessment (note: we cannot see your responses so be 100% YOU. Answer this assessment with your true self in mind (not who you think you should be or what you think we want you to be)). Go to Upgrade to see actual info to complete this assessment

Step 2. Complete the Myers Briggs Personality Assessment. Answer these questions based on who you naturally are. A great tip is to recall how you were as a child, not necessarily who you have grown into being. This assessment is about your true instinctive nature. Go to ?Upgrade to see actual info

Step 3. Attach your test results (screenshot or general results) as well as your resume, cover letter, and an inspirational quote that makes you happy.

IMPORTANT NOTE You must add the word #superstar to the application subject or you will not be considered.

title: Help Desk Technicians
description:
The Service Desk Technician (SDT) possesses technical knowledge and problem-solving skills. The SDT should have prior experience working in an IT environment or have recently graduated with a qualified certification. We're willing to train a recent certificate holder but you must have attained a recent certificate. Our SDT takes on first- and second-level support calls and tickets and strives to see them through their resolution. The SDT does have knowledge of and is comfortable with troubleshooting among others Windows workstations, basic networking equipment, familiarity with cloud services and some client applications.

This position is great for someone that wants to be able to solve problems consistently but wants to build a much deeper technical skill set. As the SDT, you get to touch a LOT of different tech across multiple verticals and learn a lot, about a lot. You must be open to advancing technically and committed to learning new tech. You also need to be able to deal with the challenges of delivering customer support.

Responsibilities

• Must enjoy working with customers and helping people. Empathy and sympathy are paramount to position success.
• Takes ownership of first- and second-level support calls and tickets and sees them through completion; things like Email and Application Issues, Moves, Adds & Changes and basic windows and mac troubleshooting.
• You'll help deploy, monitor and manage some of our backup and recovery solutions.
• You'll build and decommission machines according to our standards and best practices
• You'll own some administrative tasks like tracking Warranties, Shipping, ISP Accounts, Phone Bills, Etc. 
• Troubleshooting the Office 365 and Google Workplace ecosystems is a key part of this roll
• Assists with phone system configurations and troubleshooting
• And all the other tasks that come with helping deliver the best customer service possible to local and remote workers

Outputs

• You'll help write and improve technical documentation 
• And track assets and equipment distribution for new equipment

Technical Skills:

• Working knowledge of Windows and Mac systems is key – client OS, networking protocols, printing & productivity tools
• Experience working with Office 365 and Google Workspace are huge plusses (Azure AD, Exchange, Gmail, Drive, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, Etc.)
• Advanced troubleshooting of workstation/laptop hardware and software
• Basic Knowledge of key network protocols – TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, Telnet, SSH, TLS, SSL, SIP, POP, IMAP, VPN is useful
• Understanding of virtualization technologies - Hyper-V, VMWare, or Citrix, and understanding of VLAN concepts would be nice
• Knowledge of cloud technologies – Microsoft Office 365 and Azure AD, AWS (EC2, S3, VPC, IAM) is where you'll be heading as you train up
• Understanding Automation and how to use it reduce workload


What Should I be Able to Do:

We’re looking for candidates with a strong technical background in Windows Workstation as it fits in the Azure and Microsoft Cloud technologies realm, specifically the Microsoft 365 eco-system including, Exchange, Conditional Access, Intune, Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and Azure AD. You’ll have some experience in basic networking technologies like LAN, WAN, VLANs, Default Routing, Firewalls, and network services like DHCP, SMTP, SSL, Content Filtering & DNS and more. Obviously you may not know all of these tools or technologies but you should be able to discuss and explain many of them.

One of our organizational objectives is to retire all on-premise hardware and move all of our clients to 100% cloud whenever possible. The more experience with this the better.

Candidates with the following experiences preferred: MSP tools and concepts like Connectwise Manage, Automate, Control & Sell (or similar PSA & RMM Tool Experience), SOP’s, Structured Cabling, Sentinel One, Virtualization, Intune and some CLI/Linux.


Why Work for Proper Sky

As an MSP, we get to touch a LOT of different technology and deal with tech all day long. In the past, some of our best employees worked in a different industry but changed careers because they love working with technology. Every day brings a fresh set of technical challenges to conquer. We work 100% tech all day long. You’ll get to work directly with executive staff and key stakeholders. You won't just be supporting one piece of software all day long. Each day will bring fresh challenges!

We have a great team of hard-working techs that love IT and strive to bring our clients the best support they can day in and day out.

We provide guidance and leadership training through some of the IT Nation programs as well as third party training and support. With this position you will have the ability to grow and move into different roles.

We provide a equipment and stipends for internet connections and WFH space.


Additional Details
This position is a work from home position. You will be required to work M-F, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. EASTERN STANDARD TIME with one hour for lunch.

Our office is located in Abington PA.

We are hiring 2 people for this role

title: Community Moderator
description:

Role Title: Community Moderator


Purpose of Role: 

As a community moderator, you'll play a pivotal role in fostering an engaged and thriving community ecosystem. Facilitating AppSumo promotions, announcements, and webinars within The Sauce will be part of your regular tasks. 

Beyond moderation, you'll spearhead initiatives to boost engagement and community sentiment, brainstorming and executing innovative projects such as regular posts on new tool launches, webinars, networking opportunities, and courses. Additionally, your role extends to strategizing community growth tactics, including advertisement initiatives and implementing new community spaces based on member feedback.

Moderate community

Review new posts and comments throughout the entire community to make sure people are adhering to community guidelines. Remove posts, comments, and users who violate guidelines. 
Monitor flagged members and approve/deny their posts and comments.
Work with Support to flag any tool-related issues for the team. Post large-scale tool updates. Report specific customer complaints to Support so the team can further investigate.
Post promotions and announcements.
Review “Requests” and other posts where customers are providing feedback and pass it along to appropriate internal teams.
Work with members to host events and help them market the events.
Market partner webinars.
Post all event recordings in “Event Recordings.” 
Generally engage with the community. Ask questions, reply to Introductions and Celebrations, etc.
